Checking sizing before ordering. I ordered a medium. It was way too big .
Feels like it will be comfortable for my future flights.  My reason for purchasing.
Fabric feels a bit strange and not in a good way. The fit is also a bit wonky but it will be fine for hanging out at home. I would not buy sgain
Would order a size down from normal. Comfortable but almost too baggy.
Loooooooove these. Perfect over leggings. Came out of dryer a little “linty” but maybe that’s just my bad luck ?
Arrived balled up in plastic bag.  Wrinkles. Can’t put in dryer.  Looked used
Very cute oversized sweatshirt. I am returning the cream for the white. Petty just not what I was looking for.
Love the blue color.  Also love the feel.
This is the nicest sweatshirt. Looks good. Feels good. Fits nice. I’m getting more in other colors.
Zipper was broken

I was influenced to try this. It’s cute and good quality. It’s just too oversized for me in the back. I live in a cold climate. This was loose enough in the back I would have been fight a draft even with a shirt underneath.

I really love how oversized it is… it was reallly big my first wear, so much so I ordered a size down in another color. That being said, once I washed it — it shrunk just enough that I love love the fit. I’m 5’11, athletic, 185lbs with dds. Love wearing this with leggings. I kept the XL. Only complaint is that the pocket is a little hard to access.

评论概述: The color and shape are weird
评论详情: This color ended up being more brown and the shape is like a tent. Not attractive at all.
Great sweatshirt super good quality. Washes nicely and doesn’t shrink.

评论概述: Ordered dark gray and received light gray 2 x
评论详情: I have purchase several of these sweatshirts in several colors over the last 9 months or so.  I first ordered one in black, light grey and brown in February of 2024 and really like them.  Then in December of 2024 decided to order one in dark gray.  I received it and wore it, then a few weeks later when I was putting laundry away I noticed I had 2 light grey's and no dark grey.  On both orders they shipped light grey. They are very comfortable, good quality at a great price BUT the colors they show are totally off.

Love how comfy, soft, long, and oversized it was. Buy your normal size if you want that oversized look. Sometimes I just need to vent out in different indoor/outdoor temperatures and the zippered neck line is perfect for doing that.  I’m returning a previous purchase from another brand and it was no wear near as perfect as this was. So happy!!
Fits true to size. Size up for a loose fit. I love all the color options too. It is great quality also!
Nice weight. Very comfy and long enough to wear with leggings.
This is a great swaetshirt! Comfortable, long, great color!

评论概述: Cute but I can’t tumble dry this? Seriously?
评论详情: Cheap China garbage that can’t handle a dryer. Cute, but I’m returning it.
I wear a large and after reading reviews I ordered a medium. It’s still oversized and fits the way I hoped. I really like it and plan to order more.
Love it. Fits great and goes with everything.
Very soft and comfy.

I purchased the Blue in size Med ( my normal size). The color is beautiful !  The blue has a contrasting black zipper so it looks darling with black leggings.  Its long enough to cover my bum and it has pockets- what more could you ask for?

评论概述: Not side pockets as stated. This has a front pouch much like the pouch on a hoodie.
评论详情: I like it. Comfortable. Very oversized, which is fine with me. Covers the backside. Quality seems good. I like the zipper detail at least on the dark gray, not sure I’d like it on others more contrasting colors. If my opinion changes after washing, I will update.
It’s a great value with softness and quality I expected!! Will order more.
Comfy, warm, and super cute
I now have two colors in this sweatshirt! Love the fit. It covers enough to wear with leggings. Great with jeans as well. Great sleeve length! I want more colors!

Unfortunately this runs small so is going back.  The fabric had fold marks on it and even after throwing the top in the dryer the lines did not come out.  Not great fabric.  Lots of other great choices out there.

评论概述: Not the same as the picture in any way at all.
评论详情: The shirt is thick and bulky and does not hang like it looks like it does in the picture, and the color is completely off. I’ve ordered two, they both came the same color, not navy blue, more of a medium gray blue puky color.

I tried it on and am wearing it right now it so soft and comfortable on a fresh north wind!  I got the small slice so many said it was oversized and unless it shrinks a lot, I’m happy as it fits now. It’s just loose enough to be fashionable and cute on an old gal!  The navy is a true dark blue, not quite saturated.
Soft, roomy, true to size. Washes well, I bought 2

I absolutely love this shirt.  It has a fleecy lining and is very warm in my drafty house.  I just ordered my fifth one: just wish they came in pretty bright colors like red, cobalt blue, turquoise, butter yellow, emerald green, orange.  Very oversized, I went down two sizes and they're still loose.  Sleeves very long but I double back the cuffs. Very attractive and stylishly flattering.

评论概述: Color is very different than listing
评论详情: The shirt looks nice. It is a nice thickness. I’m wearing it straight out of the package so when the wrinkles are gone, I think it would be really cute with leggings or tighter pants. However the reason I am returning it is because the color is totally different than the listing I ordered the beige, which looks like an off-white or beige. What I got was a light yellow/peach type color which was awful.  I am giving up on this brand. I ordered it in a second color the desert palm since the first was returned and it is not the greenish khaki brown It looks in the photo. It is a coffee poop brown, and the ribbing is lighter than the sweat sweatshirt.  This company’s pictures do not match the actual color of the sweatshirt

评论概述: Love this sweatshirt. Goes with jeans or leggings!  I’m ordering another one in white.
评论详情: Comfort and quality and it looks great too.

This sweatshirt is oversized. I normally wear a 2x but sized down. The body fit nice and loose but the drop shoulder felt weird on my arms. The sleeve was a bit tight and I felt restricted. To get a proper fit in the arms I would have to order a 2x but then the body would be way too big. I wanted to love it so bad but just couldn’t do it. I wish it had regular shoulders. The purple was lovely. Felt like great quality for the price.
Oversized, comfortable,  easy to launder, good value for money.  Keeps you warm, not hot
The quality was good as was the price, but I definitely should have ordered I size smaller than I usually do.
Love this sweatshirt, perfect weight.  I sized down (XL) and it’s plenty roomy.  The only thing that, for me, isn’t great.  The band around the wrist is long and tight.  A good buy, and comfortable

Good, quality material (it is not too thick or hot) however the top is EXTREMELY oversized!  I had to return and order one size smaller (I could have order two sizes down).  I went with one size smaller, though, so I could dry the top completely in the dryer.
Beautiful color but boxy and frumpy fit. Ribbing at bottom twisted and shrunk when washed (even though it was air dried).

评论概述: Excellent quality and advertised spot on!!
评论详情: Finally … great quality and I will be reordering!
I spend more time taking oil stains off this shirt than anything I have ever purchased.  It seems the fabric stains easily. Oils appts from just anything I touch!
Really liked this top. I purchased a size large which is what I always wear and the fit was right on. I wore it once and did a couple of chores with it on
I really like my sweatshirt, but in this color (brn) it does tend to stain more…
Heavenly!!  Large fits perfectly!!  I usually wear Large.  Very comfortable!!  Just like the picture.  I’ll order from Dokotoo again.
The quality and style are nice.

From reading the review I knew to go down in size so I purchased a Large which fits very loosely. I ordered this one in blue (M) and I like it for a neater look and fit.  I like the quality and style of both the the pink and blue. I’m tempted to order another one.

Very nice top, but runs very big. I usually get at least a 1x or 2x for added room, but after reading the reviews I bought a large and it was plenty roomy.  I would buy another, so I do recommend.  I am 5"2 and it comes to my mid thigh and over my butt with plenty of room. I love the pockets.
Purchased in white and lavender. This is a go to for me. It washes and dries great. Comfortable but not hot, good butt coverage.
Beautiful feminine color and looks just like the pic!  Its oversized so size down one if you want a tts look.
The fit was great 👍
Buy it now: oversized fit, soft, perfect weight Want it in all colors  Works great with a bump
It wasn’t as long as it looks like it would be. Very disappointing!

I was so disappointed with this oversized sweatshirt, it was huge, the sleeves were way past my fingertips and the fabric was cheap. It looked great on the model but nothing like it when I tried it on.
I unfortunately missed the deadline to return this item.

This is such a great oversized sweatshirt. It is so soft on the inside, nice, and thick. Long enough to cover the booty in leggings. I gave it 4 stars because it smelled when I tried it on. I'm hoping the smell goes away after washing.

I love the look and the fit.  Be sure to consult the sizing chart.  I did not use the recommended size but I went with the bust size that was close to my size.  Once the bust size is correct for you the rest of the item should fit.  That is unless you have other fit issues.  Good luck!
very oversized.  be aware.  nice thick fabric but i did have to iron out the shipping creases.i ordered small.  5'4" 110 lbs
I've had this sweatshirt for a few months and wash it on a delicate setting.  The bottom band has stretched out and looks sloppy.  I just wear it around the house now.
I love this top.  It is a nice heavy weight, soft fabric and lovely soft color (I got the pale lavender).  Fit as expecte3d

评论概述: Size down and color is off
评论详情: I should have ordered down from my normal XL! The green is more brown, while I'd hoped for an olive. But the weight and fabric are great. Zipper stuck a bit, but that should smooth out with wear. The sleeve cuffs look to be more than 6 inches long on the model, but they're barely 5 inches and the longer cuff was what I liked. Plus they were quite wide so I'd have to push them up past my elbows. Might try a large in the Palm color which looks more green than the green!

Love this sweatshirt.It came just as it said.I love the roominess in it.I bought an extra large but i'm buying another one in the large just to see the difference . It did come wrinkled , however , quick little press with the iron and it all came out and looked fabulous
true to size
This item was way too big! Returning it
I loved it so much I bought another one.

评论概述: beautiful color, soft, oversized - cannot be dried in dryer
评论详情: Beautiful color (as pictured), very soft fabric, definitely oversized (as described) - would consider sizing down even if going by their size chart. Con: Cannot be dried in tumble dryer (wish I knew this in advance).
Super soft! Not too thick. Not too thin. Perfect for Texas fall or winter. Will probably buy in other colors!
I machine dried this sweatshirt after washing and it came out fine.  No shrinkage.

This is a great pullover!  Love that it has hoodie style pockets in front!  I ordered 2 in different colors.  Very nice quality.  Fit as expected.  No issues with the zipper.  The material is super soft and nice thickness for cooler days.  Originally bought the light grey and cream color.  The cream color had a slight sewing flaw near the zipper.  It also had a yellow tint to it and not a true cream color.  I returned that one and bought the brown instead.  Love these! No pilling so far.  Only washed once.

评论概述: Love the fit but color is weird
评论详情: I ordered khaki and cream. When I received them the khaki and cream were pretty close so I sent back the cream and kept the khaki. I don’t love the color of the khaki, it doesn’t look like the pic but more of a dirty cream. I kept it because I liked the fit and it’s cozy for around the house.

评论概述: Not as purple as the picture
评论详情: It is a nice sweatshirt, but the purple is VERY faint, almost white. The picture shows a much prettier color. I'm keeping it but wish the color was a bit more noticeable.
Love this oversized sweatshirt. Be aware, you may have to iron it to get wrinkles out. Washed it, removed quickly from dryer…wrinkles were still there. Iron worked. I bought a 2nd one

Soft thick(ish) sweatshirt. Comfortable fit and roomy without looking sloppy! Very pleased with this and will be buying in more colors. Great transition piece for fall or early spring during cooler weather.
True to size, love it!! Great for upcoming trip to CO

评论概述: The color is not true to the picture
评论详情: Sweatshirt is nice

Putting this on your immediately can tell it’s cut wrong and the arm pits are way too low so you have to buy it oversized for it to hang properly but then it’s like you are wearing a tent. I ordered 2 different sizes and both had the same issue so it wasn’t just a fluke.

I'm very happy with this oversized zip sweatshirt for my travel day tomorrow! Super soft material, not too heavy and certainly oversized. I got the beige XXL, color is a little weird I think, a little too much yellow. So I returning for a black XL, as I could use a little less roominess as well.

I bought the white on sale, and wish I had gotten more colors. I will get two more when they are on sale again. I love the fabric weight and fit. Can layer with ease!  Just got the purple o) and the n sale. I'm obsessed with these sweatshirts!
I like this sweatshirt. I have ordered one in each color.

评论概述: I do love this big, comfy, hangy top and really pretty purple!
评论详情: It is a medium weight and very loose and I am about 5 ft 8 1/2 and it drapes down about where the picture shows on the top of your thighs or a bit lower.  Really love the happy light purple!

I was sooo disappointed in the color that I didn't even think it was worth unpacking to look at. So pale, it's nearly white. What happened to the purple color? Please somebody fix it. I wanted this but now I hafta send it back bc white was NOT my selection.
Was to big.  Has to be returned

Flattering, comfy sweatshirt. Love my many colors. So cute  with jeans or shorts. Works fashionably in all seasons!  Highly recommend- super warm. Hasn’t shrunk after many washes.  And I feel good when wearing it!
It was ok. I ordered an xxl which was a mistake. This think would fit my horse!!  Seriously!!!!  I wear a size 16 and I wanted it a bit baggy. I don’t know what to do with it
Sent back. Did not like material

I’ve worn this twice over two days. First,  I paired it with workout pants. It was super comfy. I like how it drops down lower in the back tans like the storage area, pocket, in the front. I then wore it on a 10 hr plane trip. I like that the 1\4 zip provided a lot of ventilation. The length provided warm on the plane. I want to buy again.

评论概述: Great fit - flattering- and so comfortable
评论详情: Not too cropped or boxy, just right. Washes up well too- the fabric is decent quality. It’s a little warmer than you might need for summer but it’s perfect for a comfy air-conditioned day around the house. The collar shows well in zoom meetings too- you don’t look sloppy on camera.

This is the most comfortable sweatshirt I own. It looks a little more dressy than a sweatshirt. You can wear it out to lunch and still feel put together while enjoying the comfortable feel.  I liked it so much I bought one for a gift.
I have many of these tops, I love the way they fit.

评论概述: Wifey wears it all the time!
评论详情: Everyone loves it !

I do not write reviews. But I love the sweatshirt so much I had to. It’s exactly as described. Comfortable, oversized, the color is exactly as indicated, I love the contrasting, black zipper, and the long sleeve cuffs. The batwing sleeves, give it a Styled look!! The back covers my bum and I’m 5 9 1/2. If you like a fitted look, this is not the sweatshirt for you, but if you like comfortable and oversized with style, you’re gonna wanna buy more than one!
Super soft and flowy. I am normally a 18-20 and wanted a loose fit so I got a 3x. I feel like it's loose enough but not sloppy. Great go to sweater
Very nice material, fits well  Oversized but not too oversized

Nothing like the photo, just a ugly sweatshirt
